<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Toppling Dance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4472) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Dance Underfoot](/Feats.aspx?ID=4467)

</column>

---

While sharing a creature's space using Dance Underfoot, your melee weapons and unarmed attacks gain the [trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196) trait, but only against the creature whose space you share. You can be in the same space as a Large or larger prone creature, even if it's not your ally.
name: Toppling Dance
